title: Applied Mathematics and Mechanics
additional-notes: This is a monographic series.  Before concluding a volume is in the public domain, search for renewals for it under its distinctive title. We have not systematically checked volume titles for this serial.

Some volumes in this series are translations of works previously published in other countries.  There may still be active copyrights on the original works, even if they lacked renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
